thumb.title: Figure Shxt Out podcast guest CEO Richard Blank Costa Ricas Call Center
thumb.description: The Figuring Shxt Out podcast hosted by Bunee Flacs & King Arthur. The King of Communication Ft Richard Blank | Ep. 105The Figuring Shxt Out podcast by Buneeflacs and Swangkkking is Two business and positivity minded individuals trying to just Figure Shxt Out! We cover topics ranging from wellness, wealth, health, business and being an entreprenuer!This week we speak with Costa Ricas own Richard Blank! Richard is a communications expert and has trained well over 500 call center employees in Costa Rica and beyond. Learn from this magnificent communicator and oral strategist!Come with us and Let's Figure Some ShXt Out! Feel free to check out each new Episode where we feature a business owner, or someone who is inspiring the masses in their own positive way here every Saturday at 6pm EST!https://youtu.be/tGM1NDkESWchttps://youtu.be/ehl8OiSLC8chttps://youtu.be/gRGDKkrH7nghttps://youtu.be/KX1yAx8MlWURichard Blank hired bassist Garry Gary Beers of INXS. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ieGjN5H4xPQ
